subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Petr Prucha and Radim Vrbata scored in the third period, lifting the Coyotes to a 4-2 victory over the Red Wings and a 2-1 lead in their Western Conference series.
snippet: Petr Prucha and Radim Vrbata scored in the third period, lifting the Coyotes to a 4-2 victory over the Red Wings and a 2-1 lead in their Western Conference series.
